name: Be fast! Space shooter
description:
Space shooter game with a simple rule:
More seconds will pass before you will collect a new coin, more enemies will spawn.

Upgrade your ship to move and kill FASTER. (Auto-save feature)

WSAD - Move

LMB - Primary fire mode

RMB -Secondary fire mode

Shift - Speed boost (damage enemies if you hit them, lose hp when hit enemy with boost)
Force field gives you immortality for a couple of seconds.

When an enemy is killed by laser enemies near him will get damage.

Made by: TheRottenCookie - Paweł Zwoliński. Have fun!

Music: Andrew Sitkov

Sound effects: https://freesound.org/
